issue.title: [Rust]: Return error on mismatching datatypes in json reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10082](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10082). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/f358a29b35a9059c42aa8e6bcdd7a17136f14647/rust/arrow/src/json/reader.rs#L678>

 

If the schema specifies a different datatype than what is in the file the value gets silently ignored. Instead we should return an error.
